Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: DrDK
Reviews.Content: Well it didnt deter the guy that stole if from me, but functionally it did the job! Can you believe it, someone stole it?

Reviews.Title: Q-See Decoy cameras
Reviews.Author: mike basye
Reviews.Content: I recieved the cameras, one of the cameras did not work. The red flashing light did not work. I call the tech support line, and did al the testing they required, they determined the camera was defective. I was told I would receive a return ticket so I could send the camera back and they would replace it. I have not recieved any thing for the return. Due to the cost of they one camera, About $15.00. it is a waste of my time to keep calling to try and get it replaced. Q-See cameras haqve bad customer service, I give them a rating on "sucks"

Reviews.Title: Great addtion to security systems
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: Have worked as an addition to my current cameras helps with the illusion of more coverage and the included sign is a bonus, cameras are the same Q-See bodies as one of their 'true' cameras so they look exactly like the 'real' thing.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Kevin O.
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, great sign, likely will scare away most potential burglars- hopefully they will go somewhere else where there is an easier target.

ProductInfo.Features:
2 Decoy Cameras (Non-Operational)
Realistic Light Effect of Infrared LEDs (Battery)
Weatherproof Indoor /Outdoor
Mounting bracket for Easy Installation
Bold indication that the premises are being recorded
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSSIGD2 Decoy Cameras and Warning Sign (2 Pack)
